author: COMSOL
description: This example illustrates the modeling of Andrew's squeezing mechanism, also known as seven body mechanism, a benchmark problem for multibody dynamics. The links in the mechanism are rigid and ten hinge joints are used to establish the connections between them. The results obtained, various angles in the mechanism, are compared with the result from the reference.
label: andrews_mechanism.mph
name: root
